kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.msg: Typing text 'test_document.txt' into text field 'css=input[placeholder='Enter file name']'.
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.msg: Typing text 'This is a test document' into text field 'css=textarea[placeholder='Start typing...']'.
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Click Button
kw.doc: Clicks the button identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Verify Document Is Saved
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.msg: Element 'xpath=//div[contains(text(), 'File saved successfully')]' not visible after 5 seconds.
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: File Should Exist
kw.doc: Fails unless the given ``path`` points to an existing file.

kw.name: Get File
kw.doc: Returns the contents of a specified file.

kw.name: Should Be Equal
kw.doc: Fails if the given objects are unequal.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.
